title: Bobby’s Fiancé Caitlin Stops By To Talk About Their “Bear Grylls” Episode + Someone On The Show Saved A Life! + Eddie May Get His First Tattoo!
itunes:title: Bobby’s Fiancé Caitlin Stops By To Talk About Their “Bear Grylls” Episode + Someone On The Show Saved A Life! + Eddie May Get His First Tattoo!
description:
Bobby’s Fiancé Caitlin talks about the hardest part while they were filming their episode of Running Wild With Bear Grylls that airs tonight on NatGeo at 9/8pm CST! She also challenges Amy in a TV game. One of us saved a life over the weekend and has the proof! Amy also gives us an update on if she thinks she is getting scammed by a lady she bought a cat from. Bobby also asks Eddie if he would ever get a tattoo and even offers him a suggestion of something meaningful.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
